name: Daily Quotes Kural
author: Surya

sections.description:
The Thirukkuṛaḷ is a classic Tamil sangam literature consisting of 1330 couplets or Kurals. It was authored by Thiruvalluvar. The Thirukkuṛaḷ is one of the most important works in the Tamil language. This is reflected in some of the other names by which the text is given by such as Tamiḻ Maṟai (Tamil Bible); Poyyāmoḻi (words that never fail); and Teyva nūl (divine text). The work is dated to sometime between the third and first centuries BCE. Thirukkural represents the way of life through rationale and humane values/principles. (Zilch religions)

Key Features

  • Simple short code ‘[Thirukkural]’ available to display random quotes.
  • Simple drag and drop widget options integrated with wordpress structure.
  • Facility to extend and modify the functionality of the plugin using WordPress filters.
sections.installation:
Follow the steps to install the plugin:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly by searching “Thirukkural” plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

After installing the plugin, Navigate to Appearance -> Widget and then add the widget “Thirukkural”.
Random Quotes will be displayed in the website as per your widget/Theme settings.

short_description: A widget to display random Thirukkural (classical Tamil couplets) quotes over the website.
